{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = HP |model = NC380T |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/01/2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/HP_NC380T |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCIe |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = quad-lane
|vendor_id = 14e4 |device_id = 164a |subvendor_id = 103c |subdevice_id = 3070 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM5706;BCM5706CKFBG; |chip2 = Broadcom;BCM5706;BCM5706CKFBG; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|linuxdriv = tg3 |windriv =
|eth_ports = 2 |eth_speed = 1GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = <!-- Support automdix --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Support Jumbo frames -->
|is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 2006 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device appears to present itself to the host system with two 14e4:164a (103c:3070) PCI IDs..
==See also== :;[[HP Ethernet Adapters]] *[[HP NC110T]] (434905-B21) - 1x 1GbE (RJ-45), PCIe, [[Intel]] i82572 *[[HP NC320T]] (367047-B21) - 1x 1GbE (RJ-45), PCIe, [[Broadcom]] BCM5721 *[[HP NC332T]] (615732-B21) - 2x 1GbE (RJ-45), PCIe, [[Broadcom]] BCM5720 :NetXtreme 2-port Gigabit Ethernet PCIe Adapter (14e4:165f/103c:1786) *[[HP NC360T]] (412651-001) - 2x 1GbE (RJ-45), PCIe, [[Intel]] i82571 *[[HP NC361T]] (652497-B21) - 2x 1GbE (RJ-45), PCIe 2.1, [[Intel]] i350 *[[HP NC364T]] - 4x 1GbE (RJ-45), PCIe, [[Intel]] i82571EB/i82571GB :PCI ID: [http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/8086/10bc/103c704b (8086:10bc/103c:704b)] *[[HP NC365T]] (593722-B21) - 4x 1GbE (RJ-45), PCIe 2.0 x4, [[Intel]] i82580 :HP Model: HSTNS-BN58; P/N: 593720-001, 128KB <!-- 596743-001 --> *[[HP NC366T]] (811546-B21) - 4x 1GbE (RJ-45), PCIe, [[Intel]] i350 *[[HP NC370T]] (374191-B21) - 1x 1GbE (RJ-45), PCIe, [[Broadcom]] BCM5706 *[[HP NC373T]] (394791-B21) - 1x 1GbE (RJ-45), PCIe, [[Intel]] i82543GC <!-- (395861-001) --> *[[HP NC375T]] (538696-B21) - 4x 1GbE (RJ-45), PCIe, [[NetXen]] NX3031 *[[HP NC380T]] (394795-B21) - 2x 1GbE (RJ-45), PCIe, [[Broadcom]] BCM5706 *[[HP 535T]] (813661-B21) - 2x 10GbE, PCIe, [[Broadcom]] BCM57416 *[[HP 561T]] (716591-B21) - 2x 10GbE, PCIe 3.0, [[Intel]] X540 *[[HP 562T]] (817738-B21) - 2x 10GbE, PCIe 3.0, [[Intel]], Gen10 *[[HP NC7170]] (313881-B21) - 2x 1GbE (RJ-45), PCI/PCI-X, [[Intel]] i82546
